mapper.insert:
select cart_m_seq.nextval from dual
insert into cart_m (cbno, id, pbno) values (#{cbno}, #{id}, #{pbno})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.cbno desc) as num, c.cbno, c.id, c.pbno, c.quantity, c.putdate, a.price, a.name, a.image, a.abno, t.name as t_name, t.pbno as tpbno from cart_m c inner join product_m p on c.pbno = p.pbno inner join album_m a on c.pbno = a.pbno inner join track_m t on a.abno = t.abno where c.id = #{id}
